ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: AUSPEX I\nHeightened Sense
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Enhance Vampiric senses\n\nImprove Sight and Hearing.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: AUSPEX II\nPremonition
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Visions of the future\n\nImprove Melee Dodge Chance and lower the chance of triggering traps

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: AMALGAM II\nPanacea
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description:
Calm nerves to you or an ally

Mental Break Threshold -9%
Gain a small amount of Willpoer

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: AUSPEX III\nShare the Senses
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Find the weakness of a target

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: AMALGAM III\nFatal Flaw
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Improve the target senses\n\nThe bonus disapper if the caster or the target die

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: AUSPEX IV\nSpirit's Touch
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Gathering emotional residue from an object or location\n\nGlobal Learning Factor +50%

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: AUSPEX V\nClairvoyance
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Allows the vampire to rebuild a target tattered soul\n\nImprove mood but lower brain efficency

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: AMALGAM V\nUnburdening the Bestial Soul
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Information gathering from surroundings\n\nGlobal Learning Factor x130%
